Game.Name: Zoids Saga Fuzors (Japan)
Game.plot: Zoids Saga: Fuzors is a Role-Playing game, developed by Amedio and published by Tomy Corporation,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: Secret ZoidsAfter beating the game, enter a code at the title screen to gain the Zi Data you need to build the secret Zoids. Remember to save after entering the codes!
